messages.message:
<!channel> PSA: I have updated the base crafting image to support go 1.24.4. Please update your Crafting sandbox by clicking the *RESYNC* button and selecting the "Force Update Base Option." After the upgrade, you should see:

```$ go version
go version go1.24.4 linux/amd64```
As always, post here if you have problems. Ty all!!
